SELECT a.menu_type_cd, a.menu_nm, b.auth_seq, a.menu_seq, b.auth_menu_seq, c.auth_cd, a.up_menu_seq, a.menu_url, a.open_yn, CASE WHEN b.menu_seq IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS selectYn, COALESCE(d.noAuthCount, 0) AS noAuthCount, COALESCE(e.subMenuCnt, 0) AS subMenuCnt FROM tb_menu_SAMPLE a LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_auth_menu_SAMPLE b ON a.menu_seq = b.menu_seq AND b.auth_seq = #{authSeq} LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_auth_SAMPLE c ON b.auth_seq = c.auth_seq AND c.USE_YN = 'Y' LEFT JOIN ( SELECT a.up_menu_seq, COUNT(a.menu_seq) AS noAuthCount -- 테이블 'a'의 'menu_seq'와 'up_menu_seq' 사용 FROM tb_menu_SAMPLE a LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_auth_menu_SAMPLE b ON a.menu_seq = b.menu_seq WHERE b.auth_seq IS NULL GROUP BY a.up_menu_seq ) d ON a.menu_seq = d.up_menu_seq LEFT JOIN ( SELECT a.up_menu_seq, COUNT(a.menu_seq) AS subMenuCnt -- 테이블 'a'의 'menu_seq'와 'up_menu_seq' 사용 FROM TB_MENU_SAMPLE a WHERE a.USE_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY a.up_menu_seq ) e ON a.menu_seq = e.up_menu_seq WHERE a.use_yn = 'Y'
